jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Accountable for topline (i.e. transaction, revenue) and bottomline metrics (i.e. cost, profit) of a city 
● Fully accountable to build, maintain, and continuously improve business operations of the city to ensure efficient operation on a day-to-day basis 
● Accountable for demand (partner acquisition) and supply of the city (i.e. retention and activities) 
● Design and implement localized marketing campaign and activities for the city 
● Work closely with stakeholders & leadership in regional level to develop and execute market strategies 
● Takes full ownership of the city’s budget and targets.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• At least 7 years experience with extensive exposure to city/branch operations with exposure to BTL marketing and stakeholder management
  • Holds at least a Bachelor’s degree from reputable university
  • Experience in growing branch revenues is a plus
  • Preferably a native of or has spent significant time (>2years) in representative area; strong network and knowledge about the respective city
  • Has existing relationship or able to bridge, develop, and maintain good relationship with key partners such as, but not limited to, local/regional government stakeholders (including province, regency, city, and district), 3rd party partners, merchants, associations, communities
  • Strong in organizing, planning, and relationship management
  • Very fluent in number, excellent in analyzing data, and using analytics to make decisions
